caption:
Swipe ⬅️ A Purdue University student-built robot set a new world record by solving a Rubik’s Cube in just 0.103 seconds, smashing the previous 0.305-second record. 

To achieve this, they engineered a custom cube core to handle the extreme speed and forces during the solve.

(🎥: @lifeatpurdue @purdue.ece @guinnessworldrecords)
